item.title: [code help] reading from a file
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

this compiles fine but if i call it the client freezes can anyone see anything wrong with it

[code]public String mailFrom;
public String mailMessage;

public boolean loadMail()
{
    String line = "";
    String token = "";
    String token2 = "";
    boolean EndOfFile = false;
    int ReadMode = 0;
    BufferedReader characterfile = null;
    try{
        characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./mail/" + playerName + ".txt"));
    }
    catch(FileNotFoundException fileex){
        misc.printlnTag(playerName + ": dosnt have mail");
        return false;
    }
    try{
        line = characterfile.readLine();
    }
    catch(IOException ioexception){
        misc.println(" error loading mail file.");
        return false;
    }
    while(EndOfFile == false && line != null){
        line = line.trim();
        int spot = line.indexOf("=");
        if(spot > -1){
            token = line.substring(0, spot);
            token = token.trim();
            token2 = line.substring(spot + 1);
            token2 = token2.trim();

                    if(token.equals("From-Player")){
                        mailFrom.equals(token2);
                    }
                    else if(token.equals("The-Message")){
                        mailMessage.equals(token2);

}
if(line.equals("[EOF]")){
try{
characterfile.close();
}
catch(IOException ioexception){}
return true;
}
}
try{
line = characterfile.readLine();
}
catch(IOException ioexception1){
EndOfFile = true;
}
}
try{
characterfile.close();
}
catch(IOException ioexception){}
return false;
}[/code]
